entry.title: Tuesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few rain showers or flurries early this evening. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 then light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
